title: Happy Birthday Azir!!
body:
May your kills be numerous and your CS plentiful!
You have now been in the game for the same amount of time that you were in development.

My boy, all grown up. :3

{{champion:268}} {{champion:268}} {{champion:268}}

replies.body: And he's being reworked. Does it look promising?
Judging from most other non VU reworks they have done.... probably not.
At least i have more terrain to PARKOUR
